review: Dr. Deepak is too good with his approach towards the treatment, made the procedure without any pain and got my confidence with his explanation about the treatment. I'll definitely recommend Dr.Deepak for any kind of dental treatments.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: What a nice new facility! Coming into the clinic it is clean, bright, and nicely appointed. The staff is professional and greeted me right away. The wait was 5 minutes. Dr. Deepak Raj was very professional, friendly, and attentive. The equipment is clean, new, and up to date.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It was a very nice service and the doctor was very friendly to approach. All the process involved in the treatment were explained clearly and the service is inexpensive as compared to market standards. I would really suggest him to my friends and family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: i found him on practo that he had a good feedback from patients and also he is studied from saveetha college (dentist)  where i also studied (engineering) .Deepak sir is very down to earth and friendly. He clearly explained tons of doubt i had with patience. After consulting him and taking the treatment now I feel very confident about my oral health condition. Thank you Sir, will definitely recommend to my friends and family!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Deepak treated a cavity and replaced the crowns of two of my teeth which had undergone root canal treatment several years back. The entire procedure was painless and I was kept well informed of the procedure. Dr was very sensitive to my fears regarding pain as well as safety during this pandemic. He values patients' time which I appreciate. I am deeply thankful and would certainly recommend him to family and friends.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: I was in braces treatment for a year.. What he promised on the first day the exact result came out after 1nd half year and the amazed one is I had never gone through any sufferings like pain in the entire process... Dr Deepak is completely cool to the patient's especially with juvenile nd senior citizens... He is really impeccable when it comes to dental braces  treatment
